definition: A financial benefit given to an individual in recognition of their work, typically granted by an employer. It is commonly used to refer to an increase in one's salary or wages.

examples.english: The employees are demanding a salary increase.

examples.german: Er hat eine Gehaltserhöhung von 10% erhalten.
examples.english: He received a salary increase of 10%.

examples.german: Die Gehaltserhöhung wird im nächsten Monat wirksam.
examples.english: The salary increase will take effect next month.

examples.german: Die Gewerkschaft verhandelt über eine Gehaltserhöhung.
examples.english: The union is negotiating a salary increase.
